attributes.action: find and support a replacement other than, Gordon (the destroyer) Brown. Then resign, pack your bags and leave this once great country that you have "trashed."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We can't get rid of this government for a couple of years Mr Blair.
Your hidden agenda has worked, you have crippled this country and made us the 'dustbin' and 'laughing stock' of the world. Now have the decency to retire immediately. 
Mr Brown will be close on your tail, for he too is keen to impliment your 'destruction of the UK, agenda.'
